overview:
Technology veteran who has worked in Finance, Sales, Marketing and now M&A.

Began career at Oracle working in Finance. Moved onto work in sales at the #1 technology IPO of 2000, Embarcadero Technologies. After a brief time in sales at Mercury Interactive, joined Salesforce.com in 2004.

At Salesforce held multiple roles including sales effectiveness, product marketing, and ran the Competitive Intelligence team there.

Most recently working with the M&A team on acquisitions such as Radian6, Assistly, Rypple and Buddy Media.
